title: "Popular Steam Indie Game Blasted For Potential Use Of AI"
excerpt: "Supermarket Simulator gained fame on Steam but is now facing backlash over possible use of AI for promotional images. Users on Reddit suspect the main image of the game is AI-generated, prompting discussions on ethics and authenticity. Nokta Games has not confirmed the use of AI, but the controversy continues to spark debate among players and fans."
